definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The movies he made became art-house classics .
sentences.chinese: 他拍攝的影片成了藝術片的經典之作。

sentences.english: He made what today would be called independent films, art films.
sentences.chinese: 他導的是今天的獨立影片，藝術片。

definition: lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
to play the same old tune (idiom); unoriginal
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
